long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem:
I recently submitted some R packages for review, and I would like to make them available in EPEL. However, they have a dependency on R-RUnit, which is currently not available in EPEL. What do you think about providing the package in EPEL?
Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable):
N/A - which is the issue
Additional info:
I downloaded the R-RUnit source rpm for F23 and sent it as a scratch build in koji. It built without modification for EPEL 6 and EPEL 7:
EPEL 6: https://koji.fedoraproject.org/koji/taskinfo?taskID=12953169 EPEL 7: https://koji.fedoraproject.org/koji/taskinfo?taskID=12953161
I you wish to maintain it you have my blessing, feel free to ask the branch in pkgdb :)
R-RUnit-0.4.26-7.el7 has been submitted as an update to Fedora EPEL 7. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-EPEL-2016-9162b8fdc4
R-RUnit-0.4.26-7.el6 has been submitted as an update to Fedora EPEL 6. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-EPEL-2016-be2389df1f
R-RUnit-0.4.26-7.el7 has been submitted as an update to Fedora EPEL 7. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-EPEL-2016-9162b8fdc4
R-RUnit-0.4.26-7.el7 has been submitted as an update to Fedora EPEL 7. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-EPEL-2016-9162b8fdc4

R-RUnit-0.4.26-7.el7 has been pushed to the Fedora EPEL 7 testing repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report. See https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/QA:Updates_Testing for instructions on how to install test updates. You can provide feedback for this update here: https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-EPEL-2016-9162b8fdc4

R-RUnit-0.4.26-7.el6 has been pushed to the Fedora EPEL 6 testing repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report. See https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/QA:Updates_Testing for instructions on how to install test updates. You can provide feedback for this update here: https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-EPEL-2016-be2389df1f

This bug appears to have been reported against 'rawhide' during the Fedora 24 development cycle. Changing version to '24'.
More information and reason for this action is here: https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/Fedora_Program_Management/HouseKeeping/Fedora24#Rawhide_Rebase
R-RUnit-0.4.26-7.el6 has been pushed to the Fedora EPEL 6 stable repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.
R-RUnit-0.4.26-7.el7 has been pushed to the Fedora EPEL 7 stable repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.
